atDirectives.name: @tailwind
atDirectives.description: Use the `@tailwind` directive to insert Tailwind's `base`, `components`, `utilities` and `screens` styles into your CSS.

atDirectives.name: @apply
atDirectives.description: Use the `@apply` directive to inline any existing utility classes into your own custom CSS.

atDirectives.name: @responsive
atDirectives.description: You can generate responsive variants of your own classes by wrapping their definitions in the `@responsive` directive.

atDirectives.name: @screen
atDirectives.description: The `@screen` directive allows you to create media queries that reference your breakpoints by name.

atDirectives.name: @variants
atDirectives.description: Generate `hover`, `focus`, `active` and other variants of your own utilities.
